{"id":391164209,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â years","timestamp":1599276513,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/391164209/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"// recursion\nclass Solution {\n    \nprivate:\n    double fastPow(double x, int n) {\n        if (n == 0) return 1;\n        double ret = 1;\n        if (n % 2 == 1) {\n            ret *= x;\n        }\n        double half = fastPow(x, n/2);\n        ret *=  half * half;\n        return ret;\n    }\n    \npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if (n < 0) {\n            x = 1 / x;\n        }\n        return fastPow(x, n);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
